name: The Luckiest Businessman
description:
Ludum Dare 40 entry.

Please try downloadable version available at the bottom of the page if you have troubles with WebGL.

You are the luckiest businessman in the world. No matter what you do your business is always flourishing. But is having a lot of money always that good? Somehow you feel that the more you have, the worse it gets!

M - mute music.

Goal of the game is to buy a private island to hide from mob and police. In order to do that you have to meet lawyer first.
